title: Thomas Carlyle - characterized as a writer

content.question: On the basis of the first paragraph, Thomas Carlyle is best characterized as a writer who is

choices.label: revolutionary, agitating his readers to adopt a radically new worldview
charismatic, enticing his readers to support his views and beliefs
provocative, compelling his readers to reach their own conclusions
masterful, overpowering his readers with a sense of awe and veneration

content.answer: provocative, compelling his readers to reach their own conclusions

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
